description: Try our easy to follow Macadamia-Crusted Chicken With Roasted Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Macadamia-Crusted Chicken With Roasted Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine 2 tbs oil, zest and lemon juice, thyme and garlic. Add chicken and sweet potato, season and toss to coat. Transfer to tray in a single layer. Spread mustard over chicken and press on nuts. Bake for 30 minutes. Add tomatoes and broccoli and drizzle over remaining oil. Bake for a further 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender and chicken is cooked through. Set aside to rest, loosely covered with foil, for 10 minutes. Top with basil and serve.
